mapper.select: SELECT review.id, review.place_id, review.writer_id, review.content, review.point, review.created_at, review.updated_at, review_image.id as review_image_id, review_image.image_file_id, review_image.review_id FROM review JOIN review_image ON review.id = review_image.review_id WHERE review.id = #{id}
